name: Clockwork Panic
description:
GameDev.TV Community Game Jam 2020 Submission.

Github source files - https://github.com/SuFR/ClockworkPanic

Instructions

  • Mouse cursor handles player direction
  • Use shield to bounce projectiles away from player and into enemies
  • "W" to move toward mouse cursor
  • Space bar to freeze time
  • Survive for time limit to move on to next stage

Team

  • Lead Programmer - Mike "Sureimnormal" Silva
  • Jr. Programmer - Joe "SuFR" Shekmer
  • Modeler & Animator - Peter "Morgan" Morgan
  • Sound Design - Andrew "MasterZuse" Drost
  • Concept Art - František "Prismal" Schwan
